Title: River Descent
Specific Destination & Description: Rent a kayak or canoe from a base like Jarnac Canoe or Cognac Canoë to paddle the scenic Charente River.

Title: Track Rider
Specific Destination & Description: Pedal a unique rail bike on a beautiful route with Velo Rail Charente-Limousine (near Roumazières-Loubert).

Title: Canopy Climb
Specific Destination & Description: Tackle high ropes courses and zip lines at Feel Nature Parc Aventure (in the forest near Angoulême) or similar parks.

Title: Golden Spirit
Specific Destination & Description: Visit a prestigious producer like Hennessy, Martell, or the family-owned Cognac Raby for a tour and tasting.

Title: Sunset Aperitif
Specific Destination & Description: Sample Pineau des Charentes and Cognac at a dedicated vineyard like Domaine de Beaulieu (Germignac) or Vignoble Vincent (Oléron).

Title: Escargot Delight
Specific Destination & Description: Seek out traditional dishes like Cagouilles (snails) at a local restaurant or market in a town like Angoulême or Cognac.

Title: Turquoise Oasis
Specific Destination & Description: Take a peaceful walk and picnic at the stunning turquoise Lacs Bleus de Guizengeard (near the border of Charente-Maritime).

Title: Gourmet Market
Specific Destination & Description: Wander through the beautiful Art Deco Les Halles d'Angoulême covered market for local produce.

Title: Waterside Repose
Specific Destination & Description: Relax by the Plan d'Eau de la Grande Prairie lake at Saint-Yrieix-sur-Charente (just outside Angoulême).

Title: Fairytale Castle
Specific Destination & Description: Explore the magnificent architecture of the Château de la Rochefoucauld.

Title: Stone Grotto
Specific Destination & Description: Discover the unique monolithic Saint-Jean Church in Aubeterre-sur-Dronne, carved into a cliff.

Title: Comic Masterpiece
Specific Destination & Description: Visit the Cité Internationale de la Bande Dessinée et de l'Image (Comic Strip Museum) in Angoulême.

Title: Island Pedals
Specific Destination & Description: Rent a bicycle at Saint-Martin-de-Ré or Ars-en-Ré to explore the extensive cycle paths of Île de Ré.

Title: Coastal Adrenalin
Specific Destination & Description: Book a jet-ski, kitesurf, or windsurf session from a water sports base in La Rochelle or Royan.

Title: Treetop Trek
Specific Destination & Description: Experience the high-ropes courses and forest trails at Parc Aventure de Fontdouce (near Saint-Bris-des-Bois).

Title: Briny Treasure
Specific Destination & Description: Stop for an oyster tasting at the La Cité de l'Huître (Marennes) or one of the cabanes along the Chenal de la Cayenne.

Title: Saffron Mussels
Specific Destination & Description: Enjoy a bowl of Mouclade at a traditional restaurant on the Vieux Port in La Rochelle.

Title: Salt Worker
Specific Destination & Description: Buy high-quality sea salt and fleur de sel directly from a producer like Sauniers de l'Île de Ré.

Title: Atlantic Sand
Specific Destination & Description: Spend a leisurely day at a large beach like Plage de la Grande Côte (Royan) or Plage des Saumonards (Île d'Oléron).

Title: Island Sanctuary
Specific Destination & Description: Take a ferry to the car-free, peaceful Île d'Aix for a relaxed day trip.

Title: Sea Wellness
Specific Destination & Description: Book a revitalizing thalassotherapy or spa treatment at Thalazur Thalassothérapie in Royan.

Title: Medieval Harbour
Specific Destination & Description: Climb the Tour Saint-Nicolas, Tour de la Chaîne, and Tour de la Lanterne in La Rochelle.

Title: Fortress Glory
Specific Destination & Description: Discover the UNESCO-listed Vauban Fortifications and the Citadel in Saint-Martin-de-Ré.

Title: Imperial Past
Specific Destination & Description: Explore the Gallo-Roman Amphitheatre and the Abbaye aux Dames in Saintes.

Title: Screen Thrills
Specific Destination & Description: Spend a day at the Futuroscope theme park, known for its cutting-edge cinematic attractions.

Title: Aqua Sports
Specific Destination & Description: Enjoy sailing, kayaking, or paddleboarding at the Haut-Poitou Sailing Center on the Lac de Saint-Cyr.

Title: Rural Roam
Specific Destination & Description: Rent a bike and follow the scenic routes of the Vélo Francette itinerary near Châtellerault.

Title: Poitou Break
Specific Destination & Description: Purchase the local cake, Broyé du Poitou, from a boulangerie in Poitiers or Montmorillon.

Title: Pyramid Cheese
Specific Destination & Description: Sample Chabichou du Poitou goat cheese directly from a local farm or a market in Poitiers.

Title: Sweet Legacy
Specific Destination & Description: Taste the unique macaron and learn its history at the Maison du Macaron in Montmorillon.

Title: Riverside Chill
Specific Destination & Description: Stroll and relax along the Ilot Tison area by the Clain river in the city of Poitiers.

Title: Cliffside Village
Specific Destination & Description: Wander through the stunning medieval village of Angles-sur-l'Anglin (Plus Beaux Villages de France).

Title: Wetland Calm
Specific Destination & Description: Take a peaceful walk through the unique ecosystems of the Réserve Naturelle Nationale du Pinail (near Vouneuil-sur-Vienne).

Title: Ancient Murals
Specific Destination & Description: Visit the UNESCO-listed Saint-Savin-sur-Gartempe Abbey to see its famous Romanesque frescoes.

Title: Eagle Display
Specific Destination & Description: Explore the medieval town of Chauvigny and watch the spectacular falconry show at the Château des Évêques.

Title: Regional Antiquity
Specific Destination & Description: Discover local history and fine arts at the Musée Sainte-Croix in Poitiers.

Title: Green Glide
Specific Destination & Description: Rent a barque (flat-bottomed boat) or canoe from a loueur like Cardinaud in Coulon to navigate the Marais Poitevin.

Title: Gorge Plunge
Specific Destination & Description: Get an adrenaline rush with a Bungee Jumping experience at the Viaduc de Coquilleau (near Breuil-Barret) with a company like Elastic Crocodil Bungee.

Title: Cream Gold
Specific Destination & Description: Visit the village of Échiré (near Niort) to see the famous Échiré Butter Dairy and buy products at the local shop (visitor centre info can be limited).

Title: Black Dome
Specific Destination & Description: Try Tourteau Fromagé, a distinctive local cheesecake, available at most bakeries (boulangeries) and markets in Niort.

Title: Goat Delights
Specific Destination & Description: Sample artisanal goat cheeses like Mothais-sur-Feuille at a local farm like Chèvrerie de Bougon or a Niort market.

Title: Niort Flow
Specific Destination & Description: Take a leisurely walk along the Sèvre Niortaise River and around the green spaces near the Donjon de Niort.

Title: Niort Legacy
Specific Destination & Description: Explore the impressive Donjon de Niort (Niort Keep), a 12th-century fortress and museum.

Title: Ancient Wealth
Specific Destination & Description: Tour the ancient, accessible Melle Silver Mines (Mines d'Argent des Rois Francs).

Title: Zoodyssée
Specific Destination & Description: Chizé National ForestFull summer opening hours for this fantastic European wildlife park. Perfect for a long, shaded forest walk to see bears, wolves, and lynxes.

Title: Parthenay by Lantern Light
Specific Destination & Description: ParthenayThe medieval town of Parthenay often runs special Nocturnal Lantern Tours (Visite Nocturne à la Lanterne) in August, offering a unique, atmospheric evening exploration of its cobbled streets and history.

Title: Melle Romanesque Churches & Mines
Specific Destination & Description: MelleVisit the trio of remarkable Romanesque churches (a UNESCO World Heritage Site).
